code: import{combineReducers}from'redux';import userReducer from'./users/user.reducer.js';import cartReducer from'./cart/cart.reducer.js';import{persistReducer}from'redux-persist';import storage from'redux-persist/lib/storage';import directoryReducer from'./directory/directory.reducer.js';import{shopReducer}from'./shop/shop.reducer.js';var persistConfig={key:'root',storage:storage,whitelist:['cart']};var rootReducer=combineReducers({user:userReducer,cart:cartReducer,directory:directoryReducer,shop:shopReducer});export default persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);
